newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK's Kwoon Chung flotation 53.5 times subscribed.
newsitem.headline: HK's Kwoon Chung flotation 53.5 times subscribed.

text.p: Flotation of shares of Hong Kong-based bus line operator Kwoon Chung Bus Holdings Ltd was 53.5 times subscribed, the company said on Thursday.

The company said it received applications for a total 2.84 billion shares compared with 53.1 million shares available for public subscription, and another 5.9 million shares for staff were fully allotted.
Dealing in shares is expected to commence on September 25.
Kwoon Chung offered 59 million new shares at HK$1.80 each, raising proceeds of HK$93 million, to expand its bus related business in Hong Kong and China. - HK Newsroom (852) 2843 6370
